name: 9/11. 20 Year Anniversary NFT. FACTS TO #NEVERFORGET
description:
This is me being a "non-political" artist of my times. 
Seriously, this is art that should be remembered. 
These are facts that I wish to mint as an artist.
These facts will never be deleted from our history now that now minted on the blockchain. 

You can collect a piece of the memorial history with various price points. 

2977 Editions minted to honor the lives lost on 9/11
2000 Editions originally listed for 1 tez
900 Editions originally listed for 9 tez 
77 Editions originally listed for 11 tez 

I meet people, connect dots, and provides smart green solutions. 
I have two products; quality and integrity, they are not for sale. 
What do i do, whatever it takes. 
I make media art happen; that's my brand.

We are a group of US Veterans and communities working together as a collective social enterprise towards a sustainable revolution. 

This is my One Time Offer for you: 
Collect this before someone else collects it for more. Do it, do it now. 

Activate your NFT at BenjaminHorbowy.com/art
Every NFT comes with Epic Values 

GENERAL HORBOWY NFT OFFER
GAIN ACCESS TO THE HORBOWY.ART NFT STUDIO 
Join the GoGetters Club
Become a Crypto Game Changer 
Learn from the brightest minds
- Tokenology & Strategy 
- Tonkenomics & Game Theory 
- Blockchain Updates 
- Major NFT Movements
- Earth2 Development 

GUIDE TO COLLECTING HORBOWY ART NFTs. 
STEP 1. Swap Tezos for Art & get 2 editions. 
STEP 2. Activate NFT at Horbowy.Art 
STEP 3. Reswap 1 edition for 10x-1000x at least. 
STEP 4. Vault 1 edition. 
STEP 5. Advanced tokers only: Burn 2+ editions. 
Why burn a token? To limit supply & increase value.

Read more about the artist in the Book For Ears: SAVING AMERICA, A Fight For Faith Family Freedom
